AARON=AARIE|AARY|ARI|ARRI
ABBOTT=AB
ABEL=ABE
ABIGAIL=ABBEY|ABBIE|ABBY|GAIL|GALE|GAYL|GAYLE
ABRAHAM=ABE
ACACIA=CACIA|CASIA
ADAM=AD|ADDY|ADDIE
ADELAIDE=ALEY|ELA|ELKE|LAIDEY|LAIDY
BENJAMIN=JAMIE|BIN|BENN|JAMEY
MADELINE=MADGE|MADIE
